meanings.definition: A board displaying information or advertising, typically outdoors.
meanings.sent1: The signboards along the highway helped drivers find their way.
meanings.sent2: I saw many signboards outside the shops in the city.
meanings.sent3: The signboards at the zoo made the animals look like they were giving directions.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright signboard in a dark room, impossible to miss.
meanings.sent5: The neon signboards in the night sky lit up the city like a constellation.

meanings.definition: To display information or advertising on a board.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to signboard their new product in the local market.
meanings.sent2: She signboards her artwork at the upcoming exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The students signboarded their project with colorful drawings to attract attention.
meanings.sent4: His actions signboarded his intentions clearly to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The chef signboards the daily specials on a chalkboard outside the restaurant.
